holes.original_proof:
exfalso
exact
  h₆
    ⟨(f 0), by
      funext x
      have h₇ := hf
      have h₈ := h₅
      have h₉ := h₁
      have h₁₀ := h₂
      have h₁₁ := h₃
      have h₁₂ := h₄
      simp_all [Finset.sum_Icc_succ_top, Nat.cast_add, Nat.cast_one, Nat.cast_zero, add_assoc] <;> (try ring_nf) <;>
                (try norm_num) <;>
              (try linarith) <;>
            (try simp_all) <;>
          (try (aesop)) <;>
        (try (simp_all [Real.sin_add, Real.cos_add, mul_comm] <;> ring_nf at * <;> norm_num at * <;> linarith))⟩

obtain ⟨α, hα⟩ := h_main
refine' ⟨α, _⟩
simpa [hα] using hα
